properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR out 10 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 21 at 2:53PM PST until January 22 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Small craft conditions expected through Wednesday
morning, southwest winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
seas 14 to 19 feet at 15 seconds. Gale conditions expected
Wednesday, south winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and
seas 11 to 16 feet at 12 seconds expected.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head
OR out 10 NM.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 10 AM to 4 PM PST Wednesday.
For the Small Craft Advisory, until 10 AM PST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The gales will be south of the Columbia
River Bar.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 4 PM PST WEDNESDAY
